|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MXF-L1000 MXF-L1000] (06/06/2016), OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=1C:49:7B 1C:49:7B] ([[Gemtek]]) :Model: 3PJMVB001W (1x White), 3PJMVB003W (3x Kit White)
===Specifications=== * Product class: ''AC1300'' (400Mbps [2.4GHz] + 867Mbps [5GHz]) * Antennas: 4x internal high-gain antenna * Ports: USB: 1x ''USB 2.0'', Bluetooth 4.0 * Ethernet: 1x GbE WAN, 1x GbE LAN
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33004-luma-surround-wi-fi-system-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://homeservershow.com/forums/index.php?/topic/11316-first-take-on-luma-experience/ On '''HomeServerShow'''] *[http://www.pcmag.com/review/345495/luma-home-wifi-system On '''PCMag''']
